de.wota.gameobjects

Class AntAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.wota.gameobjects.AntAI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GathererAI, GathererAI, GathererAI, Mao, MoveAI, QueenAI, SoldierAI

    public abstract class AntAI
extends java.lang.Object
    Basisclass for ais by the user. Contains several lists describing the objects which are visible to the ant.

        void setParameters(Parameters parameters)

      • tick

        public abstract void tick()
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        tick() gets called in every step of the game. The ai has to call methods of AntAI to specify the desired action.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any Exception generated in tick() gets thrown!

      • visibleFriends

        Parameters:
        playerId - id of the specific player

      • closest

        protected <T extends Snapshot> T closest(java.util.List<T> toConsider)
        Determines the object of a list of candidates which is closest to the player.
        Parameters:
        toConsider - list of Snapshots (e.g. Ants, Sugars, Hills) from which the closest gets chosen
        Returns:
        null if toConsider is empty, otherwise the closest in toConsider

      • moveInDirection

        protected void moveInDirection(double direction)
        Move in certain direction with maximum distance
        Parameters:
        direction - measured in degrees (0 = East, 90 = North, 180 = West, 270 = South)

      • moveInDirection

        protected void moveInDirection(double direction,
                   double distance)
        Move in direction with specified distance
        Parameters:
        direction - measured in degrees (0 = East, 90 = North, 180 = West, 270 = South)
        distance - distance to move in one tick

      • moveToward

        protected void moveToward(Snapshot target)
        Move in direction of an Object Stops when target is reached.
        Parameters:
        target - can be anything like Ant, Sugar, ...

      • moveToward

        protected void moveToward(Snapshot target,
              double distance)
        Move in direction of target but only the specified distance.
        Parameters:
        target - Target to move towards.
